SIGMOID - main.java.neat.functions.ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION
Sigmoid activation: f(x) = 1/(1+e^(-x)) Smooth S-shaped curve that maps any input to (0,1) range.
SQUARE - main.java.neat.visualizer.GenomeVisualizer.SHAPE
Square node representation - nodes will be rendered as squares with equal width and height.
STEP - main.java.neat.functions.ActivationFunction.ACTIVATION_FUNCTION
Step function: f(x) = x > 0 ? 1 : 0 Binary output based on whether input is positive.

Sums all input values.
